properties.title: Dunadd Bookswap

properties.description: MS Centre Mid-Argyll The Multiple Sclerosis Centre in Lochgilphead are offering the local community a Warm Space to meet during the Winter months every Monday from 7th November 12pm to 2pm. They will provide a warm friendly welcome, a cup of soup, hot drinks and other refreshments, free Wifi and charging points. There will be no charge to anyone who uses the Warm Space. They would be most grateful, however, if you are in the position to be able to help them help others by contributing to their Warm Space fund. During the Warm Space sessions they aim to have a "Coorie Cupboard" containing fleeces, socks, gloves and other warm items available free of charge too.

properties.description: Citizens Advice Bureau - Lochgilphead The CAB in Lochgilphead can offer a warm space and small meeting rooms to local organisations this winter. Phone: 01546 605550 Email: info@abcab.org.uk
properties.title: Citizens Advice Bureau - Lochgilphead

properties.description: Mid Argyll Hospital are offering a warm space in the Physiotherapy gym on a Tuesday afternoon from 1.30-4pm, all welcome.
properties.title: Mid Argyll Community Hospital

properties.description: Loch Gair Association Join at the Lochgair Hall, where the Lochgair Association is excited to provide a welcoming space for everyone to gather, chat, and unwind over a hot cup of tea, coffee, and a biscuit in their newly renovated hall. Explore the library and borrow books at the fantastic price of 50p. Additionally, try your hand at a jigsaw puzzle or other engaging games available. This space is yours, and they'd love your input for more activities during the warm gatherings. Embrace a warm welcome at Lochgair Hall every Thursday from 3 PM to 4:30 PM.
properties.title: Loch Gair Association
